title: Increase in U.S. RIR - USD Value - Change in NX

content.question: If the real interest rates in the United States rise relative to rates in other countries, what will happen to the international value of the United States dollar and United States net exports?

choices.label:
Value of the Dollar
 Net Exports

Depreciate
 Increase

Value of the Dollar
 Net Exports

Depreciate
 Decrease

Value of the Dollar
 Net Exports

Depreciate
 No change

Value of the Dollar
 Net Exports

Appreciate
 Decrease

Value of the Dollar
 Net Exports

Appreciate
 Increase

content.answer:
Value of the Dollar
 Net Exports

Appreciate
 Decrease

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.5: Changes in the Foreign Exchange Market and Net Exports

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
